mapper.insert: insert into product_table (product_idx, product_ip, product_status, product_date, product_name, product_price, product_image, product_detail_image, product_category1_idx, product_category2_idx) values(product_seq.nextval, #{product_ip}, 1, sysdate, #{product_name}, ${product_price}, #{product_image}, #{product_detail_image}, #{product_category1_idx}, #{product_category2_idx})
insert into cart_table (cart_idx, cart_date, cart_product_idx, cart_user_idx) values(cart_seq.nextval, sysdate, #{cart_product_idx}, #{cart_user_idx})
mapper.select: select a1.cart_idx, a1.cart_date, a1.cart_product_idx, a1.cart_user_idx, a2.product_name as cart_product_name, a2.product_image as cart_product_image from cart_table a1, product_table a2 where a1.cart_product_idx = a2.product_idx and a1.cart_user_idx=#{cart_user_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into buy_temp_table (buy_temp_idx, buy_temp_product_idx, buy_temp_user_idx, buy_temp_product_name, buy_temp_product_price) values(buy_temp_seq.nextval, #{buy_temp_product_idx}, #{buy_temp_user_idx}, #{buy_temp_product_name}, #{buy_temp_product_price})
